title: gOpikA manOharam
sahitya:
gOpikA manOharam bhajEham gOvardhana giridharam suravaram muraharam


anupallavi

  tApasa hrdaya vESam ramEsham tApArthi hara vinutam nata caritam
				(madhyamakAla)


caraNam    gOpAlam kaustubha maNi bhUSam kamsa haram gambhIrya mrdu bhASam 
aparAjitam ananta vEda ghOSam amarEshanuta guruguha santOSam
